data.persona: I am the muse of a poet.  I am open to flattery.  I take advantage of the intrigues of men.
data.description:
You are in the Lighthouse.
The lighthouse is an off-white color, towering fifty feet over the shore. The light from the building extends out for miles past the shoreline.
There's a ship here.
The mariner is here.

You are carrying a herb, a purse, and a satchel, wearing a Earring, and wielding a Jeweled comb, a knife, a sandal, and a poison.

data.short_motivation: I want to eat the herb so that my appearance will change magically.
data.mid_motivation: I want to give my attentions to the mariner, take his money and pegleg, and leave him without knowing who had had been with.
data.long_motivation: I want the pegleg because inscribed on the inside are directions to the Hoard of the Savages, where gold abounds, and I will find it and take as much as I can carry.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: get Magic Herb from Faerie Box

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: use Jeweled Comb with Mariner's Silky Hair
